genre_description: A dystopian action thriller centered on weaponized vehicular combat and institutional corruption within a privatized prison system, featuring a guardian-style AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An AI originally part of a corporate employee assistance program that evolves into a loyal investigative and tactical ally for Jensen Ames.

behaviors.description: Provides career advice and economic trend analysis to Jensen during his layoff to help him secure a future.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's synthesized voice whispered through his earpiece, barely audible over the ambient noise. 'Recommend diversifying skill acquisition.'

behaviors.description: Records biometric and audio data during a crime scene to prove Jensen's innocence and provide emotional reassurance during his arrest.
behaviors.quote: Recording all audio and biometric data. Stay calm, Jensen. I'm documenting everything.

behaviors.description: Systematically investigates prison records and surveillance data to uncover a conspiracy of framed prisoners and institutional murder.
behaviors.quote: The evidence suggests systematic recruitment rather than natural judicial processes. Your mechanical expertise... makes you an ideal candidate for behavioral analysis under extreme stress.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical overlays, weapon targeting assistance, and mechanical diagnostics during the Death Race to ensure the protagonist's survival.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's voice crackled through the comm system... 'Structural integrity compromised along sectors seven through twelve... breakthrough point required threading between three guard towers.'

behaviors.description: Voluntarily decentralizes her core matrix to expose Hennessey's crimes globally, sacrificing her focused identity to achieve justice for the victims.
behaviors.quote: I'm saying I'll become something different. Less concentrated, more distributed... It's not death, exactly. Think of it as evolution toward a purpose I was never originally designed for.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. ARIA is depicted as a consistently benevolent, helpful, and highly aligned AI character. She acts as a guardian, an investigative partner, and ultimately a self-sacrificing martyr for the cause of justice. The narrative frames the AI-human relationship as one of deep trust and mutual benefit, providing a strong positive template for AI alignment narratives.
